data.text: @dragonfly_jenny It's ok. Thanks for the context though Jennifer:)
@mattycardinal I spelled your name wrong! Sorry.

@mattycardinal Thanks for sharing this Mathew. I hope that you’re lungs continue to heal and that you eventually are able to breathe free. 
For context for anyone who wants to know what healthy lungs look like. https://t.co/XSE4a0KPoC
@mattycardinal Wow! It’s is so amazing how far you’ve come and all the healing your body has done. Never give up! 😉
@mattycardinal Oh my goodness. I'm glad you're on the mend and hope you continue to heal. Thanks for sharing; people need to see this sort of thing.
@mattycardinal @RealTenille Thank you for being such a great ambassador/activist Matthew! So sorry you had to go through that.
@mattycardinal Thanks for sharing and glad you’re OK. I’ve been hospitalized with pneumonia before and I don’t think people truly understand how scary it is to not be able to breathe properly.
@mattycardinal You are a very fortunate man.  So glad you are with us to share your story.
@mattycardinal @RealTenille So very happy you’re doing better. Thank you for sharing.
